data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements)
Regulations 2015 we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its
meeting held today i.e. January 24 2026 has inter alia approved the Unaudited Financial

data.news_body: Submission of Publication of Advertisement for Rights Issue First and Final Call Record Date.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulations 30 & 42 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Outcome Of Rights Issue Committee Meeting.
data.news_body:
This is in continuation of our earlier letter dated January 08 2026. In this context we wish to inform that we are revising the Record date as Wednesday January 14 2026.

We wish to inform that the Rights Issue Committee of the Company at its meeting has approved the First and Final Call on the partly paid-up equity shares and also fixed the Record Date as Wednesday January 14 2026.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulations 30 & 42 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Outcome Of Rights Issue Committee Meeting.
data.news_body: We wish to inform that the Rights Issue Committee of the Company has approved the making of the First and Final Call for the partly paid-up equity shares issued under Rights Issue and has also fixed the Record Date as Wednesday January 14 2026 for ascertaining the eligible shareholders for making the payment of the Call Money.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulations 30 & 42 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Outcome Of Rights Issue Committee Meeting.
data.news_body:
We wish to inform that the Committee at its meeting held today i.e. January 08 2026 has approved the making of the First and Final Call on the aforesaid partly paid-up equity shares amounting to 50% of the issue price of Rs. 15.80 (including a premium of Rs. 5.80) per share i.e. Rs. 7.90 (including a premium of Rs. 2.90) per partly paid-up equity share.

Further the Committee has also fixed Friday January 09 2026 as the Record Date for the purpose of ascertaining the holders of partly paid-up equity shares to whom the First and Final Call Notice would be sent.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Intimation Under Regulations 30 & 42 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Outcome Of Rights Issue Committee Meeting.
data.news_body:
we wish to inform that the Committee at its meeting held today i.e. January 08 2026 has approved the making of the First and Final Call on the aforesaid partly paid-up equity shares amounting to 50% of the issue price of ?15.80 (including a premium of ?5.80) per share i.e. ?7.90 (including a premium of ?2.90) per partly paid-up equity share.

Further the Committee has also fixed Friday January 09 2026 as the Record Date for the purpose of ascertaining the holders of partly paid-up equity shares to whom the First and Final Call Notice would be sent.

data.caption: Non-Applicability Of SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/DDHS/DDHS-RACPOD1/P/CIR/ 2023/172 Dated October 19 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/DDHS/DDHS-RACPOD1/P/CIR/2023/172 dated October 19 2023 we wish to inform that our company does not fall in the category of Large Corporate (as prescribed in Para No. 3.2 of the said Circular) as on March 31 2025. Therefore the framework provided in the said Circular is not applicable to the Company.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations)
data.news_body:
We wish to information that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today May 27 2025 has approved the following:

(a) Re-appointment of M/s. Akhilesh & Associates Practicing Company Secretaries as Secretarial Auditor for a term of five consecutive years subject to approval of shareholders; and

(b) Appointment of M/s. CMG & Company Chartered Accountant as Internal Auditor for the financial year 2025-26.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On May 27 2025
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations)  we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today May 27 2025 has approved and taken on record the following: 
(a) Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025; 
(b) Statutory Auditors Report on the aforesaid results; and 
(c) Declaration pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the Listing Regulations read with SEBI Circular No. CIR/CFD/CMD/56/2016 dated May 27 2016.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On May 27 2025
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations)  we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today May 27 2025 has approved and taken on record the following: 
(a) Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025; 
(b) Statutory Auditors Report on the aforesaid results; and 
(c) Declaration pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the Listing Regulations read with SEBI Circular No. CIR/CFD/CMD/56/2016 dated May 27 2016.

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyCyber Media India Ltd
2CIN NO.L92114DL1982PLC014334
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 0.00
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY NA
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)Not Applicable
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Anoop Singh
Designation: Company Secretary
EmailId: anoops@cybermedia.co.in
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Sumit Khandelwal
Designation: Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: sumitk@cybermedia.co.in

Date: 28/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.descriptor: Format of the Annual Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a LC : Annexure B2
data.caption: Format of the Annual Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a LC - Annexure B2
data.news_body:
Format of the Annual Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1 Name of Company Cyber Media India Ltd
2 CIN NO. L92114DL1982PLC014334
3 Report filed for FY 2024-2025
Details of the Current block (all figures in Rs crore):
4 2 - year block period (Specify financial years)* FY 2023-24 2024-25
5 Incremental borrowing done in FY (T)(a) 0.00
6 Mandatory borrowing to be done through debt securities in FY (T) (b) = (25% of a) 0.00
7 Actual borrowing done through debt securities in FY (T)(c) 0.00
8 Shortfall in the borrowing through debt securities if any for FY (T - 1) carried forward to FY (T) (d) 0
8Quantum of (d) which has been met from (c)(e)* 0
9 Shortfall if any in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities for FY (T) { after adjusting for any shortfall in borrowing for FY(T - 1) which was carried forward to FY(T)}(f) = (b) - [(c) - (e)]{ If the calculated value is zero or negative write nil}* 0


Details of penalty to be paid if any in respect to previous block (all figures in Rs crore):
2 - year Block period (Specify financial years)FY 2023-24 2024-25
Amount of fine to be paid for the block if applicable Fine = 0.2% of {(d) - (e)}#0.00



Name of the Company Secretary :-Anoop Singh
Designation :-Company Secretary
Name of the Chief Financial Officer :- Sumit Khandelwal
Designation : -Chief Financial Officer

Date: 28/04/2025

data.news_body:
CYBER MEDIA (INDIA) LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 21/01/2025 inter alia to consider and approve This is to inform that pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Tuesday the 21st day of January 2025 inter-alia to consider and approve the following:
(a) increase in authorised share capital of the Company; and
(b) proposal of fund raising by way of rights issue.

data.caption: Intimation Of Disposal Of Legal Matter Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
This is in furtherance to our letter dated December 12 2024 whereby pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we informed the stock exchanges about the settlement of the legal matter (Petition No. O.M.P. (EFA)(COMM.) 2/2023) pending in the Honble High Court of Delhi among (1) Mr. Ram Capoor Petitioner; and (2) Cyber Media (India) Limited and Mr. Pradeep Gupta (Respondents) vide Settlement Agreement dated December 12 2024 for a total sum of USD 1000000. The matter was fixed for hearing on January 13 2025.
In this context we wish to inform that pursuant to the aforesaid settlement the Honble Court has disposed off the aforesaid petition today on January 13 2025. Coy of the Order is awaited.

data.caption: Change In Name Of Registrar And Share Transfer Agent From Link Intime India Private Limited To MUFG Intime India Private Limited
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations 2015 we would like to inform that the Company has been informed by the RTA vide its email dated January 02 2025 that its name has been changed from Link Intime India Private Limited to MUFG Intime India Private Limited with effect from December 31 2024.

data.caption: Revised Intimation Of Settlement Under The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: The Company and its Chairman have entered into settlement agreement with Mr. Ram Capoor to amicably settle the legal matter in the Hon''ble High Court of Delhi, for USD 1,000,000.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed Press Release dated December 12, 2024 being issued by the Company for settling its major legal cases, group to monetise dormant assets and chart out new growth path.

data.caption: Intimation Of Settlement Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: The Company and its Chairman, Mr. Pradeep Gupta have entered into a Settlement Agreement with Mr. Ram Capoor, to amicably settle the legal matter in the Hon''ble High Court of Delhi for a amount of USD 1,000,000.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 - Loan Agreement
data.news_body: This is to inform that the Company has entered into a Loan Agreement dated December 10, 2024 with Mr. Pradeep Gupta, Chairman and Managing Director of the Company. Details as required under Regulation 30 are enclosed as Annexure.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Regulation 47 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed copy of advertisement published in the Newspapers, ''Financial Express''- English Edition and ''Jansatta''- Hindi Edition, both dated November 13, 2024, with respect to approval of unaudited financial results, standalone and consolidated, of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2024.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On November 12, 2024
data.news_body: Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. November 12, 2024 has, inter alia, approved and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results, standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2024 alongwith Limited Review Report of Statutory Auditor on the said results.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On November 12, 2024
data.news_body: Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. November 12, 2024 has, inter alia, approved and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results, standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2024 alongwith Limited Review Report of Statutory Auditor on the said results.

data.descriptor: Reg. 39 (3) - Details of Loss of Certificate / Duplicate Certificate
data.caption: Compliances-Reg. 39 (3) - Details of Loss of Certificate / Duplicate Certificate
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 39(3) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that on October 30, 2024, we received intimation from our RTA regarding loss of share certificates.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration And Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2024.
data.news_body: CYBER MEDIA (INDIA) LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 12/11/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results, standalone and consolidated, of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2024.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: In compliance of Regulation 74(5) of the SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018, please find enclosed herewith, copy of the Certificate received from Link Intime India Private Limited, New Delhi, the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent, for the quarter ended September 30, 2024.

data.caption: Disposal Of GST Orders Dated April 26, 2024
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform that (i) GST Department vide its Orders dated April 26, 2024 raised a demand of Rs. 74,21,917, (ii) The Hon''ble High Court of Delhi, vide its Order dated July 23, 2024 remanded the matter back for fresh consideration by the GST Department, and (iii) GST Department vide its Order dated October 10, 2024 considered the matter afresh and reduced the demand to Rs. 1,800.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the trading window for dealing in securities of the Company by the Designated Persons shall remain closed from Monday, September 30, 2024 till 48 hours after declaration of the financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2024.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer''s Report
data.news_body: In respect of 42nd Annual General Meeting of the Company held on Thursday, August 22., 2024 which commenced at 12:00 PM (IST) and concluded at 01:00 PM (IST), Please find (a) Voting Results in terms of Regulation 44(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015; and (b) Report of the Scrutinizer dated August 23, 2024, pursuant to the provision 108 of the Companies Act, 2013 read with Rule 20(4)(xvi) of the Companies (Management and Administration) Rules, 2014.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Meeting Updates

The AGM was concluded at 01:00 PM (IST). In this regards, please find enclosed summary proceedings of the AGM as required under Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations  & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company has noted the resignation dated August 06, 2024 of Mr. Madan Mohan Singh as Chief Financial Officer w.e.f. the close of business hours of September 30, 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company has taken the resignation dated August 06, 2024 of Mr. Madan Mohan Singh as Chief Financial Officer w.e.f. the close of business hours of September 30, 2024, and approved the appointment of Mr. Sumit Khandelwal as Chief Financial Officer w.e.f. October 01, 2024.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i. e. August 10, 2023 has inter alia approved and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results, standalone and consolidated, for the quarter ended June 30, 2023 alongwith Limited Review Report of Statutory Auditors on the said results.
Copy of the said results alongwith Limited Review Report are enclosed for your information and record.
The Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 10:25 a.m. and concluded at 01:00 p.m.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On May 27, 2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i. e. May 27, 2023 has inter alia approved and taken on record the following:

1. Audited Financial Results, standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2023.

2. Auditor's Report on the audited financial results, standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2023.

3. Pursuant to Regulation 33 (d) of the Listing Regulations read with SEBI Circular No. CIR/CFD/CMD/56/2016 dated May 27, 2016, declaration in respect of audit reports on the aforesaid audited financial results.

We are hereby enclosing copy of the aforesaid audited financial results, audit reports and declaration for your information and record.

The Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 01:17 p.m. and concluded at 3:30 p.m.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Dear Sir(s),

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today, May 30, 2022, has inter alia approved and taken on record the following:

1. Audited Financial Results, standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022.

2. Auditor's Report on the audited financial results, standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022.

3. Pursuant to Regulation 33 (d) of the Listing Regulations read with SEBI Circular No. CIR/CFD/CMD/56/2016 dated May 27, 2016.

We are hereby enclosing copy of the aforesaid audited financial results, audit report and declaration for your information and record.

The Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 11:23 a.m. and concluded at 02:20 p.m.

Kindly take note of the above and oblige.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company have inter alia approved and taken on record the following at its meeting held today i.e. May 28, 2021:

1. Audited Financial Results, standalone and consolidated, for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2021.

We are hereby enclosing copy of the aforesaid audited financial results, audit reports and declaration for your information and record.
